title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - audio - use a headset for ATC audio
description:
In this video we will have a look at how you can configure ATC audio to be played via the headset connected to your pc and play the rest of the audio via the main speakers. There might be several reasons why you want to do it and one might be to make it more realistic ;-)
